subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The sale of the Houston Astros to Jim Crane will enable Major League Baseball to move the club to the A.L. and change the dynamics of interleague play and baseball’s postseason.
snippet: The sale of the Houston Astros to Jim Crane will enable Major League Baseball to move the club to the A.L. and change the dynamics of interleague play and baseball’s postseason.
